review_title: Awesome place for learning and growth
pros: Freedom to make an impact and supportive environment. The leadership team cares about the volunteers.
cons: Since everyone is a volunteer, the environment can be very slow paced and some areas lack ownership.

review_title: Amazing place to start your career
pros:
- Great culture, people treat others with respect and the management team ensures your voices are being heard
- Clean and well-organised code base for new people to jump in
- Supportive team mates, provides technical training
cons: Unstable number of volunteers, sometimes working process is slow

pros: This is a great organization to get your feet wet in the industry & to network with helpful and caring people.
cons: None that I can think of

job_title: Front End Developer in Vancouver, BC
cons: Don’t pay any salary. Volunteer job
